SEARCH
Module JEDI_FlipFit_GroupD_POS_Project
Package com.flipkart.business.interfaces

Interface IFlipFitGymCentre

All Known Implementing Classes:
FlipFitGymCentreBusiness
public interface IFlipFitGymCentre
Interface representing the business logic for managing gym centres and slots. It provides methods for updating, deleting gym centres, and viewing available slots.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    boolean
    deleteGymCentre(int centreId)
    Deletes a gym centre based on its centre ID.
    FlipFitGymCentre
    updateGymCentre(FlipFitGymCentre flipFitGymCentre)
    Updates the details of an existing gym centre.
    List<FlipFitSlots>
    viewAvailableSlots(int centreId)
    Retrieves a list of available slots for a given gym centre.

  • Method Details

    • updateGymCentre

      FlipFitGymCentre updateGymCentre(FlipFitGymCentre flipFitGymCentre)
      Updates the details of an existing gym centre.
      Parameters:
      flipFitGymCentre - the FlipFitGymCentre object containing updated details of the gym centre
      Returns:
      the updated FlipFitGymCentre object after the update

    • deleteGymCentre

      boolean deleteGymCentre(int centreId)
      Deletes a gym centre based on its centre ID.
      Parameters:
      centreId - the ID of the gym centre to be deleted
      Returns:
      boolean indicating whether the deletion was successful

    • viewAvailableSlots

      List<FlipFitSlots> viewAvailableSlots(int centreId)
      Retrieves a list of available slots for a given gym centre.
      Parameters:
      centreId - the ID of the gym centre for which the available slots need to be fetched
      Returns:
      a List of FlipFitSlots objects representing the available slots at the specified gym centre
